titles.title: Fast spiking cells in rat hippocampus (CA1 region) contain the calcium-binding protein parvalbumin.

detail.abstract: Fast spiking cells in the CA1 region of the rat hippocampus were revealed as gamma-aminobutyric acid (GABA)ergic non-pyramidal cells containing the calcium-binding protein parvalbumin by intracellular injection of Lucifer yellow in vitro in combination with postembedding parvalbumin immunohistochemistry.
